Posts.Content: Hi I'm new to this site  and wondered if anyone has/had Padget's disease (breast)  x
Posts.Title: Padgets desease

Posts.Content: Thank you for your replies,  I am waiting to have the 3 diagnostic tests for Padget's although I know and the cancer specialist I am already under for endometrial cancer ( had hysterectomy for it last year) thinks it is. I have the excema like rash all around my nipple and have had it for some time. I must say I'm pretty fed up to say the least knowing what's in front of me yet again. I'm nervous about the tests, what do they actually do ?  Xxx
Posts.Title: Padgets desease
